foodItems.title: Spaghetti with crumbles
foodItems.directions: Boil spaghetti until al dente. In a separate pan, cook the crumbles until browned. Heat the sauce, then combine everything and serve warm.

foodItems.title: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
foodItems.directions: Cut zucchini in half and hollow out. Sauté tomatoes, garlic, and cooked rice. Fill the zucchini with the mixture, top with cheese, and bake at 375°F for 25 minutes.

foodItems.title: Cucumber Tomato Salad
foodItems.directions: Slice cucumbers, tomatoes, and red onion. Toss with olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Chill before serving.

foodItems.title: Roasted Tomato & Zucchini Pasta
foodItems.directions: Chop zucchini and tomatoes. Toss with olive oil and roast at 400°F for 20 minutes. Mix with cooked pasta and top with parmesan.

foodItems.title: Vanilla Yogurt with Honey and Cucumbers
foodItems.directions: Spoon yogurt into bowls, drizzle with honey, and top with cucumber slices and mint if desired. Chill and serve cold.

foodItems.title: Zucchini Bread
foodItems.directions: Grate zucchini and mix with eggs, sugar, and cinnamon. Add flour and bake at 350°F for 50 minutes in a loaf pan.
